00059 NTreal ComputeConductance();
00060 void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal vM /* in mV */);
00061 void ShowChannelStatePopulation() { channelsPtr->ShowStates(); }
00062 void Show() {  cout << "alphaM=" << alphaM << "\tbetaM=" << betaM << "\topenRatio=" << ((double)channelsPtr->NumOpen())/channelsPtr->_numChannels()
00063                    << "\talphaH=" << alphaH << "\tbetaH=" << betaH << "\tgamma="<< gamma << "\tdelta="<<delta<< "\t kci="<<kci << "\t kic="<<kic<< "\tkappa="<<kappa<<"\tlambda="<<lambda<<endl;}
00064 
00066 NTreal ForwardRate(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00067             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00068             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00069             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00070             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00071 {
00072               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;// [Kelvin]
00073                             NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00074                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);                   
00075                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK)* exp(w + z*d*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00076 }
00077 
00079 NTreal BackwardRate(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00080             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00081             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00082             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00083             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00084 {
00085               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;//[K]
00086               NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00087                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);
00088                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK) * exp(w - z*(1-d)*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 NTreal Delta(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00093             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00094             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00095             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00096             NTreal del /* unit free */,
00097             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00098 {
00099               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;//[K]
00100               NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00101                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);
00102                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK) * exp((w + d*del) + z*d*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 NTreal Gamma(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00107             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00108             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00109             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00110             NTreal del /* unit free */,
00111             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00112 {   
00113               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;//[K]
00114               NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00115                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);
00116                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK) * exp((w + (1-d)*del) - z*(1-d)*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 NTreal Kappa(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00121             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00122             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00123             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00124             NTreal del /* unit free */,
00125             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00126 {   
00127               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;//[K]
00128               NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00129                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);
00130                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK) * exp((w + (1-d)/del) + z*d*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 NTreal Lambda(NTreal vM /* mV */,
00135             NTreal temp /* Celsius */,
00136             NTreal z /* elementary charge */,
00137             NTreal d /* unit free */,
00138             NTreal del /* unit free */,
00139             NTreal w /* units of kB*T */)
00140 {   
00141               NTreal T = temp + NT_0_CELSIUS;//[K]
00142               NTreal v = vM/1000.0; // [V]
00143                             NTreal kT = (NT_BOLTZMANN*T);
00144                             return (kT/NT_PLANCK) * exp((w + d*del) - z*(1-d)*v*NT_PROTON_CHARGE/kT)/1000.0;
00145 }
